item.description:
On Monday nights Heritage Farm Ice Cream puts on FREE concerts across the street at The Sampas pavilion. They also sponsor a classic car show (begins at 6pm) -cars from days gone by.

Bring a chair or blanket ( and bug repellent) for the concert while the sun sets over the Merrimack River. Heritage It's a great night out!

*We will meetup at Heritage Farm - at the porch. I will have a meetup.com pin (or sign). Then, we can walk across to the Sampas Pavilion for the concert. I will remit my cell number to all 'yes' RSVP the day prior, in the event you may be late.

You can purchase something from the Heritage Farm menu, ice cream, hot dogs, burgers, or beverage.... or you can bring your own snack. www.heritageicecream.com This is a shared event with other meetup groups.

WHERE THIS IS AN ALL-OUTDOOR EVENT, RAIN CANCELS. I will update as close to 6pm in the event the weather is questionable.

THE TONY O BAND:

The Tony O Band is a group of well rounded musicians that have recently come together from other successful groups including Tony O and The Tornadoes.
Biography
The Tony O Band new sound of cover tunes and originals is influenced by their diverse experiences and talents. Styles range from blues, jazz, and funk. This is a band that can drive an audience and capture their hearts.

The Tony O Band is a new band on the scene, but the musicians have been in the talk of the music industry for many years.
item.name: FREE Outdoor Concert On The River: THE TONY O BAND
